oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Tintype of Sgt. Francis Marion Cannon, Co. E, 3rd KY Mtd. Inf. Regt., CSA
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: This is a post-war tintype of Sgt. Francis Marion Cannon, Co. E, 3rd KY Mtd. Inf. Regt., CSA. Cannon was captured at Harrisburg, Mississippi on July 14, 1864 and sent to Camp Douglas, Illinois and then to Point Lookout, Maryland. Cannon was presented a pocket testament as a prisoner-of-war and made notations on the inside of the back cover.
